snippet: It is only merciful to give The Times’s Knicks beat writer, Scott Cacciola, a break from such a woeful team. But where should he be sent to write about good hoops?
abstract: Satirical note from New York Times sports editors informs readers that reporter Scott Cacciola will be given break from covering the New York Knicks due to their abysmal performance; solicits suggestions for what teams Cacciola should cover instead.
lead_paragraph: It is only merciful to give The Times’s Knicks beat writer, Scott Cacciola, a break from such a woeful team. But where should he be sent to write about good hoops?

headline.main: Wanted: Better Basketball for a Beleaguered Reporter
headline.print_headline: Wanted: Better Basketball for a Weary Reporter
